meanings.sent1: My sister is a naturopaths and she believes in using natural remedies.
meanings.sent2: The naturopaths in our town offer herbal treatments for various ailments.
meanings.sent3: The naturopaths recommended a tea made from leaves and flowers to cure my cold.

meanings.sent5: I remember the naturopaths because they always had a calming presence and gentle touch.
